data.eml:eml: Revision of the West Palaearctic Polistes Latreille, with the descriptions of two species – an integrative approach using morphology and DNA barcodes (Hymenoptera, Vespidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Schmid-Egger, Christian, Achterberg, Kees van, Neumeyer, Rainer, Jerome Moriniere,, Schmidt, Stefan (2017): Revision of the West Palaearctic Polistes Latreille, with the descriptions of two species – an integrative approach using morphology and DNA barcodes (Hymenoptera, Vespidae). ZooKeys 713: 53-112, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.713.11335, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.713.11335
